title: I cant shop from the store or play ranks
body:
Riot, i cant buy from the store or play ranks on EUNE why?
i need to buy from store.
 pls fix it imediatly
nvm i saw your board xD

replies.body: No worries ^_^! It seems like there were a few store issues over the night, but as far as I can tell they should be fixed up now!
